attributes.action: bring university fees down for students studying social work ma degrees
attributes.additional_details: Bring university fees down for people who are studying a masters degree in social work. The government pays a small bursary towards the students iiving expenses but when they have paid the rest of the fees off they are only left with small amount to live off. If the governemt wants to encourage people to be social workers they should increase the bursary payments and pay off all the remaining fees.
